sentences.english: There is a little bit of information of swine hepatitis E virus in Thailand.
sentences.chinese: 在泰國，有少量關於豬戊型肝炎病毒的信息。

sentences.english: This patient developed severe hepatitis with hepatic decompensation.
sentences.chinese: 該例患者患了重症肝炎，肝臟失代償。

sentences.english: Glucocorticoid plus CTX may be used to treat lupus-like hepatitis with caution.
sentences.chinese: 糖皮質激素聯合CTX治療狼瘡樣肝炎可以慎用。

sentences.english: For unknown reasons, people with alcoholic liver disease often have hepatitis C as well.
sentences.chinese: 不知什麼原因，人們往往與酒精性肝病和丙型肝炎。

sentences.english: Objective To study the infectious state of TT virus in patients with non A-E hepatitis.
sentences.chinese: 目的瞭解非甲非戊型肝炎患者TT病毒感染狀況。

sentences.english: But in the last 8 weeks - yes. I had a hepatitis A booster .
sentences.chinese: 但是在過去的8個月，我用過甲型肝炎輔助藥劑。

sentences.english: To research the affect of tattoo eyebrow on the infection of viral hepatitis type C in women.
sentences.chinese: 研究紋眉在女性丙型肝炎病毒感染中的作用。

sentences.english: Objective To investigate the clinical significance of adenosine deaminase in chronic hepatitis B patients.
sentences.chinese: 目的探討腺苷脫氨酶在慢性乙型肝炎中的應用價值。

sentences.english: The teen was hospitalized and tested positive for hepatitis A, a highly contagious liver infection.
sentences.chinese: 男孩住院後，甲型肝炎檢測呈陽性。

sentences.english: HGV infection rates in all clinical types had not difference.
sentences.chinese: 各臨牀類型間庚型肝炎病毒感染無明顯差別。

sentences.english: Objective To investigate the prevalence of hepatitis G virus in hepatocellular carcinoma.
sentences.chinese: 目的探討庚型肝炎病毒在肝細胞癌組織中存在狀態。

sentences.english: Hepatitis A and Hepatitis B were common types of hepatitis in Putuo district .
sentences.chinese: 甲型和乙型病毒性肝炎是普陀區常見的肝炎類型。

sentences.english: Hepatitis A and Hepatitis B were common types of hepatitis in Putuo district .
sentences.chinese: 甲型和乙型病毒性肝炎是普陀區常見的肝炎類型。

sentences.english: Objective To explore the nursing care of patients with auto-immune hepatitis.
sentences.chinese: 目的探討自身免疫性肝炎的臨牀護理要點。

sentences.english: Objective To explore the possible relationship between hypoglycemia and the prognosis of fulminating hepatitis patients.
sentences.chinese: 目的探討重型肝炎患者低血糖水平與預後關係。

sentences.english: without a doubt you have hepatitis--the blood test proves it.
sentences.chinese: 你無疑是患了肝炎，驗血證實了這一點。
